Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: Version with synchronous NYM adding/getting and asynchronous responce waiting. ^Perf_Add_nyms.py ^Perf_get_nyms.py

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: There is a new version of load scripts fixed by Logigear team. Need to review this scripts and make fixes in them if needed.

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: New scripts prepare adding/getting requests in files using request_builder.py and then run synchronous sign_and_submit_several_reqs_from_files/submit_several_reqs_from_files methods using request_sender.py so we don't wait for new DIDs to send txns like in old scripts.
